alert.note: Alert for Cobb; Douglas (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 05 at 4:41AM EST until January 05 at 11:48PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia... Sweetwater Creek near Austell affecting Douglas and Cobb Counties. For the Sweetwater Creek...including Austell...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Sweetwater Creek near Austell. * WHEN...Until late this evening. * IMPACTS...At 12 feet, Minor flooding continues in the woodlands and fields upstream and downstream from the gage near the Interstate 20 bridge. Portions of a paintball playing field just downstream of the bridge and athletic fields in the Woodrow Wilson Park on Mount Vernon Road are flooded with one to two feet of water. A portion of Wren Circle in Douglas County...the County Iron Works and Sunlight Drive in Cobb County begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:15 AM EST Thursday the stage was 11.1 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 4:15 AM EST Thursday was 11.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 11.2 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late this afternoon. - Flood stage is 10 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
